    • Method Detail

      • openDatabase

        public static void openDatabase()
        open the database, need to set up the server beforehand. If this step failed, status will be set to OPEN_FAILED, otherwise OPEN_SUCCESS

      • closeDatabase

        public static void closeDatabase()
        close the database if it has been successfully open

        Parameters:
        query -
        Returns:
        result set query the database for sth, usually by primary key, return as a result set, need to call next() to further handling with the return data
